segments.text: Hi , Deborah ! This is John . I'm calling from Australia .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you doing in Australia ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm attending a conference in Sydney this week . Remember ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , right . What time is it there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's 10:00 P . M . And it's four o'clock in Los Angeles , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes - four o'clock in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1
